answerText: The Overcoat[10] Dmitry Gurov meets Anna Sergeevna von Diederitz in Yalta and they have a torrid affair which makes them realize how empty their real lives are.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Virginia Commonwealth University  | 15 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name these Russian short stories  [10] This Nikolai Gogol story ends when Akaky Akakievich comes back as a ghost and haunts the Person of Consequence for not helping him recover the title article of clothing.
